SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

addSingleSidedLiquidity(address,address,.details: Provides liquidity across three ticks with different amounts

params._token: The token address to claim fees for

returns.fee0: The amount of token0 fees to claim
returns.fee1: The amount of token1 fees to claim

returns._0: true if the token has graduated, false otherwise

params._WETH9: The address of the WETH9 token
params._clPoolFactory: The address of the CL pool factory
params._swapRouter: The address of the swap router

returns.launched: true if the token has been launched, false otherwise

params._amountIn: The amount of tokens to swap
params._minAmountOut: The minimum amount of tokens to receive

params._amountOut: The amount of tokens to swap
params._maxAmountIn: The maximum amount of tokens to receive

addSingleSidedLiquidity(address,address,.notice: Add single-sided liquidity to a concentrated pool

claimFees(address).notice: Claim accumulated fees from the pool

getPool(address).notice: Returns the address of the pool for a given token

graduated(address).notice: Checks if a token has graduated

launchedTokens(address).notice: Checks if a token has been launched

launchpad().notice: Returns the address of the Launchpad contract

swapWithExactInput(address,address,uint2.notice: Swap a token with exact input
